articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Kohli fires warning to Rohit and Co. before WTC final, shares crucial advice - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli has fired a fresh warning to Rohit Sharma and Co. before the ICC World Test Championship final between India and Australia at The Oval. | Cricket
articles.content: After being upstaged by the Black Caps in the inaugural edition of the ICC World Test Championship, the onus is on run-machine Virat Kohli to make amends and deliver the goods with the bat in India's… [+2122 chars]
